sentences.en: After the house is built, how much will it cost to decorate?
sentences.cn: 房子造好后装修要花多少钱 呢 ?

sentences.en: Children’s pictures decorated the walls of the classroom.
sentences.cn: 教室的墙上装点着儿童画。
康斯太布尔风景画的海报装点着那些墙面。

sentences.en: Decorate the tunic with sequins or glitter.
sentences.cn: 用些圆形小金属片或发光小亮片装饰这件女式短上衣。

sentences.en: How could we decorate the room to liven it up?
sentences.cn: 我们怎么才能把这房间装饰得更有生气呢？

sentences.en: If you want to decorate, I can get you half - price paint.
sentences.cn: 你要想收拾一下房间的话, 我能给你买到半价的油漆.

sentences.en: Life is not composed by aphorism, how can we decorate it with pompous cliche & 1 & s? I send you my most sincere greeting in silence.
sentences.cn: 人生并非格言组成,岂能靠美丽的 辞章 来妆点, 默默中,有我对你最诚挚的祝福.

sentences.en: Michael was indecisive about how to decorate the room.
sentences.cn: 关于如何装饰房间，迈克尔犹豫不决。

sentences.en: My mother likes to decorate rooms.
sentences.cn: 我妈妈非常喜欢装饰房间.

sentences.en: People often decorate their houses with holly at Christmas.
sentences.cn: 人们总是在圣诞节时用冬青来装饰房屋.

sentences.en: The bathroom is decorated in green and yellow.
sentences.cn: 浴室里是用绿色和黄色装潢的。

sentences.en: The family decorate the Christmas tree with glass balls and lights.
sentences.cn: 全家人用玻璃球和小灯泡装饰圣诞树.

sentences.en: Use any pastry trimmings to decorate the apples.
sentences.cn: 用剩余的油酥面皮装饰苹果。

sentences.en: Use shells to decorate boxes, trays, mirrors or even pots.
sentences.cn: 用贝壳来装点盒子、托盘、镜子甚至是花盆。

sentences.en: We plan to spend the weekend decorating.
sentences.cn: 我们计划用这个周末来装修。

sentences.en: When he came to decorate the kitchen, Kenneth opted for a friendly rustic look.
sentences.cn: 装修厨房的时候，肯尼思选择的是一种亲切质朴的田园风格。

sentences.en: When they came to decorate the rear bedroom, it was Jemma who had the final say.
sentences.cn: 他们装修后面的卧室时，是耶马最后说了算。

sentences.en: You need to decorate your mind with virtue.
sentences.cn: 你应该用德行美化心灵.

words.tran_cn: 装饰，修饰（decorate的过去式和过去分词形式）

trans.tran_cn: 装饰，装潢，粉刷，糊墙纸，装点，美化，授予勋章
trans.tran_en: to paint the inside of a room, put special paper on the walls etc
to make something look more attractive by putting something pretty on it
